name: Internet Listing Service Pipelines
description: Airflow pipelens that standardized and unified data from 500,000+ property listings across our platforms (Rentals.ca, Rentfaster, Rentboard)

name: Market Insights Reporting
description: Designed and launched interactive self-service reports, that provided on demand rental market intelligence to our business users - now generating $120,000 ARR

name: Employee Data Pipeline
description: An ETL Data Pipeline to consume employee data, mask & clean, save to cloud storage and make accessible for big query

name: Residental Energy Performance Rating
description: My groups capstone project which provides an intuitive and quantitative metric to evaluate the energy efficiency of residential homes.

name: Only You Can Prevent Forest Fires Game
description: A 2D survival platform game where the user must prevent a forest fire from spreading out of control for as long as many rounds as possible

name: Chat Room
description: A Chat Room that my group developed as part of our OS class which could handle multiple simultaneous users sending messages at any point in time

name: US Map Game
description: A simple game that tests the knowledge of users by having them label every US state in a random order using a US map visual

name: Image Tagging
description: An internal tool that I created that allows users to tag images that would be used to train our models
